headline.print_headline: Pro Bono Efforts Follow Targets to the Web
headline.main: Pro Bono Efforts Follow Targets to the Web

docs.lead_paragraph: The Advertising Council, which coordinates public-service initiatives for Madison Avenue, is changing its approach to better reflect changing media-consumption patterns of the audience it is trying to reach.
docs.snippet: The Advertising Council, which coordinates public-service initiatives for Madison Avenue, is changing its approach to better reflect changing media-consumption patterns of the audience it is trying to reach.

headline.main: In Fair Calorie Counts, Who Screams for Ice Cream?

docs.abstract: The food industry and nutrition advocates have differing opinions on a new version of a rule that would require chain restaurants to display the number of calories next to each item on their menus.
docs.lead_paragraph: So how many calories, exactly, are in that tempting slice of Fudgie the Whale ice cream cake?
docs.snippet: The food industry and nutrition advocates have differing opinions on a new version of a rule that would require chain restaurants to display the number of calories next to each item on their menus.

headline.print_headline: Glaxo to Offer A Merck Drug
headline.main: Glaxo to Offer a Merck Drug

docs.lead_paragraph: GlaxoSmithKline signed a deal on Monday to sell a nonprescription version of Merck’s cholesterol-lowering drug Mevacor.
docs.snippet: GlaxoSmithKline signed a deal on Monday to sell a nonprescription version of Merck’s cholesterol-lowering drug Mevacor.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Champion Is Lighter in Weight and Spirits
headline.main: Ex-Champ Is Lighter in Weight and Spirits

docs.lead_paragraph: Emanuel Yarbrough’s nickname, Tiny, still does not really fit, but he is getting closer.
docs.snippet: Emanuel Yarbrough’s nickname, Tiny, still does not really fit, but he is getting closer.

headline.print_headline: Barely Getting By, Too Proud to Seek Help and Facing a Cold Maine Winter
headline.main: Barely Getting By and Facing a Cold Maine Winter

docs.lead_paragraph: Thousands of elderly Americans on fixed incomes face a bitter winter, with declines expected in fuel assistance.
docs.snippet: Thousands of elderly Americans on fixed incomes face a bitter winter, with declines expected in fuel assistance.
